Oddeleni investicnich prilezitosti pro kazdou aplikaci definuje publikacni misto pripadne publikacni mista. Priklady publikacnich mist: BankIntranet, BankWebsite, BankWebsite_CZ, BankWebsite_SK, ClientNewsletter, ePortal, Infoportal, Infoportal_CZ, Infoportal_SK, LetakDoCafe, Nabidka_PB_CZ, Nabidka_PB_SK, PortalVZ, PP, RaisinInternetPlatform, RanniPrehled, SavedoInternetPlatform, SeznamCennychPapiruVNabidce.
